issue.title: Different initial means (input.master) with minibatch and num-instances

content.raw:
@ericr86 Are all ```input.*.masters``` equivalent? 

It reads to me as if ```input.master``` is actually just the best ```input.*.master``` rather than something that is randomly generated separately. So if there was a race condition with the generation of the later ```input.*.master```s and one of them turned out to be the 'best' one, then we would end up with different results.
content.html:
@ericr86 Are all input.*.masters equivalent?

It reads to me as if input.master is actually just the best input.*.master rather than something that is randomly generated separately. So if there was a race condition with the generation of the later input.*.masters and one of them turned out to be the 'best' one, then we would end up with different results.
